description.en:
OpusBeat，One-Stop NFT Sports Competition Platform
OpusBeat is a new platform that integrates celebrity exclusive cards, blind box draw, and event mining. Through creative application of blockchain technology, innovate the existing business model, and write the data in the sports ecology into the blockchain, including clubs, events, stars, singers, etc. OpusBeat is committed to let fans all over the world share the wealth of sports competitions and create a new one-stop NFT entertainment sports competition platform.
